content: snowflake earrings/pendant by jennifer christensen materials  metallic crochet cotton size 10 in white/pearl  size 7/1 65 mm steel hook  2 earwires for earrings and/or 1 jump ring for pendant the kind with the single split in it abbreviations yo - yarn over chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch st stitch special stitches extended double cluster cluster yo insert hook into st indicated yo pull through 1 loop on hook chain made yo pull through 2 loops on hook yo insert hook into the chain at bottom of first stitch yo pull through 2 loops on hook repeat once more 4 loops on hook yo pull through all 4 loops picot chain 3 slip_stitch into back loop of 3rd chain from hook snowflake make 2 for earrings chain 4 yo insert hook into back loop of 3rd chain from hook yo pull through 2 loops repeat once 3 loops on hook yo pull through all 3 loops beginning cluster made chain 1 picot chain 1 cluster in 1st chain of beginning chain 4 repeat 5 more times chain 1 picot chain 1 once more join in top of beginning cluster finish off 6 clusters 6 picots 12 chain stiffen if desired attach earwires or jump ring to any picot midknightstarr webs com midknightstarr wordpress com midknightstarr@gmail com copyright 2006-2014
